repo_summary: Touch'N'Stars: WebApp for mobile control of NINA (Nighttime Imaging 'N' Astronomy) software.
strengths: Mobile operation: easily access NINA through your smartphone or tablet.
User-friendly design: simple and intuitive interface specifically optimized for mobile devices.
Supports basic functions of NINA software.
weaknesses: Requires a fully configured and running installation of NINA.
Limited support for iOS users (no native app available).
suggested_improvements: Improve installation process for Windows users.
Enhance user interface for better mobile experience.
notes: The project is in beta phase and requires further development to reach its full potential.
